author: andreasmyth
msg: First version of Bus and BusManager class (to deal with multiple busses per process) and configuration package to deal with bus arguments.

Will merge with org.objectweb.celtix.Bus after discussing package location and classloading issues. At the moment I am not quite sure why we need to provide for multiple bus classes, as there is no standard concept of a BUS like there is for an ORB in CORBA.
